name: MakeGame.exe
description:
72-Hour Game Jam submission.

Who said making games is hard? Everyone knows that the best way to make a game is to have a really really cool idea, find some inspiration from other games you buy on Scream, and click a few buttons on the world's greatest game engine, MakeGame! Don't let your dreams be dreams.

Known bugs: There is a bug with the achievement popup displaying incorrectly on different resolution screens.

Team: 
Dev - Filippo Cortese
Art- Ilse-May Brink

Sound:
Bensound & Pixabay
